name: snyk-vulnerability-scanner
//: Changing display name requires change in general.ts
description: Snyk finds bugs, security vulnerabilities, performance and API issues based on AI. Snyk's speed of analysis allow us to analyse your code in real time and deliver results when you hit the save button in Visual Studio Code. We support Java, JavaScript, and TypeScript

snyk.yesCrashReport.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
snyk.yesCrashReport.markdownDescription: Allow crash reports to be reported to Snyk.

snyk.yesTelemetry.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
snyk.yesTelemetry.markdownDescription: Allow extension's telemetry to be sent to Snyk.

snyk.yesWelcomeNotification.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
snyk.yesWelcomeNotification.markdownDescription: Show welcome notification after installation and restart

snyk.yesBackgroundOssNotification.//: Name starts with y to put it at the end, as configs are sorted alphbetically
snyk.yesBackgroundOssNotification.markdownDescription: Show scan notification for critical Open Source Security vulnerabilities when Snyk view is hidden

snyk.advanced.advancedMode.description: Allows to configure if Snyk Code analysis is run automatically, manually or every 30 minutes. Default is automatically on save.

snyk.advanced.autoScanOpenSourceSecurity.description: Run Snyk Open Source Security vulnerability analysis in automatic mode.

snyk.advanced.additionalParameters.description: Parameters to pass to Snyk CLI for Open Source security tests.

snyk.features.openSourceSecurity.title: Snyk Open Source security issues
snyk.features.openSourceSecurity.description: Find and fix open source vulnerabilities.

snyk.features.codeSecurity.title: Snyk Code security issues
snyk.features.codeSecurity.description: Find and fix vulnerabilities in your application code in real time.

snyk.features.codeQuality.title: Snyk Code quality issues
snyk.features.codeQuality.description: Find and fix code quality issues in your application code in real time.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Snyk is temporarily unavailable
We are automatically retrying to connect...

Snyk has encountered a problem. Please restart the extension: 
[Restart](command:snyk.start 'Restart Snyk')
We are experiencing a technical issue which prevents scanning your code for vulnerabilities using our VSCode extension.
Until the issue is resolved, please use Snyk's CLI command or the [snyk.io](https://snyk.io) web interface to scan your code.

Welcome to Snyk for Visual Studio Code. ðŸ‘‹
Let's start by connecting VS Code with Snyk:
[Connect VS Code with Snyk](command:snyk.login 'Connect with Snyk')
ðŸ‘‰ Snyk's mission is to finds bugs, fast. Connect with Snyk to start your first analysis!

We are now redirecting you to our auth page, go ahead and log in. If a browser window doesn't open after a few seconds, please copy the url below and manually paste it in a browser.
[Copy URL to clipboard](command:snyk.copyAuthLink 'Copy URL to clipboard')

Thanks for connecting with Snyk. âœ…
 ðŸ‘‰ You are almost set ðŸ¤—.
[Enable Snyk Code and start analysing](command:snyk.enableCode 'Upload code to Snyk')
It looks like your organization's configuration is disabled, that's why you are seeing this message. You can easily enable it by pressing the above button and switching it on.
We apologize for the inconvenience and please [contact us](https://snyk.io/contact-us/?utm_source=vsc) if you have any other questions or concerns!
Open a workspace or a folder in Visual Studio Code to start the analysis.

You are currently running code security and quality scanning in manual mode. You are in control, no automated actions from our side.
[Scan now](command:snyk.start)
[Switch to auto-scan mode](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22auto%22%5D)

Code security and quality analysis is currently paused.
[Resume](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22auto%22%5D)

You are currently running code security and quality scanning in a throttled mode - it scans your code every 30 minutes if it detects changes in your files.
[Scan now](command:snyk.start)
[Switch to auto-scan mode](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22auto%22%5D)

You are currently running code security and quality in a fully automated mode. It scans your code for issues when you save a file.
Need to take control?
[Pause for 30 minutes](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22paused%22%5D)
[Switch to manual scan mode](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22manual%22%5D)
[Switch to throttled scan mode](command:snyk.setmode?%5B%22throttled%22%5D)
